"In a nutshell, here's the lowdown.": "If you complete this test, you'll have permission to join the new Fighter class."
"This class was added because ARKS keeps on growing and we need to further differentiate our roles."
"Fighters are similar to Hunters, and they're not a new concept. In fact, Fighters were once in wide use until ARKS membership started to dwindle."
"As for the details on Fighter class abilities, you should probably just see for yourself after the test."
